name: market for potassium chloride sludge | potassium chloride sludge | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23212/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'potassium chloride sludge', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This dataset is a consumption mix, representing the supply of 'potassium chloride sludge' from activities that produce it, to activities that consume it within the geography of this dataset, Global.;This is a constrained market. The justification for a market constraint is included in the comment field of the conditional exchange. ;This product is generally considered to be used in a close proximity of its production site. Therefore, a minor amount of transportation is also considered in this market.;Potassium chloride sludge is a by product of electrolysis processes from the spent electrolyte. It has a potassium content of 70% as K2O or 58% as potassium (K). It is further used in agriculture as a source of of potassium.

The activity starts with potassium chloride ready for transport at factory gate.

The activity ends with the provision of potassium chloride sludge to its respective consumers.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

defaultProvider.name: potassium chloride sludge, Recycled Content cut-off | potassium chloride sludge | Cutoff, U

exchanges.description: It is considered that the potassium chloride sludge is used close to the plants producing it, therefore 5 km of transportation are here considered.

flow.name: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified
